name: Unbound Changeling

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to grant you 4,646 Critical Strike for 12 sec.

description: This strange critter has a rather unsettling habit of staring at you while you eat.

spells.description:
Use: Flip to the next section.

 (1 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Every 5 sec spent in combat pulls the shadows closer to you, granting Dark Whispers. After reaching 5 whispers, the shadows manifest and rip a creature out of the Twisting Nether to assist you in combat.
Equip: When a nearby enemy or devout ally falls, you siphon a portion of their soul to gain 376 Intellect for 10 min.

Skull of the Man'ari

spells.description:
Equip: When an ally falls below 20% health you shield them in darkness absorbing the next 140,193 damage taken.

This effect can trigger once every 30 sec and does not target devout allies.
